name: The Truth
bio: “Just because I walk alone doesn’t mean I’m lost”

social_posts.post_text:
Anybody can spend a few dollars to get their song onto farming playlists and fluff the numbers but, one of the dopest stats I was shown this year is how many top 10s, 5s, and top 1, I was for people. The fact that I’m in almost 3,000 peoples top 10s was doper than breaking 100k streams. The numbers are the numbers. But to see that many people continuing to listen over and over again. That’s where I’m tryna keep building. I don’t care to get my music to a million people if they’re not going to become fans. I rather get my music to 30k people who appreciate the music and continue to listen!!! It’s about the core. This is where your rate should be determined from. Not the number of plays. But the % of fan retention you get for each organic spin. And to think I only dropped 1 project all the way back in January. The art of being desired is to disappear for a while. I’ll be back with a breath of fresh air soon. Stick with me. Love is love. Love always wins. Congrats to all the artists on Staten doing big things and big numbers. Congrats to all the smaller artists who doing better than they were last year. It’s a marathon. Not a race. Your only competition is yourself. Happy Holidays to everyone 🎄

Everybody help me wish my father a Happy Birthday. I think he 60 😂😂 Blessed to have had my father in my life. Everything I don’t say enough I said right here in the music. Love you bro @mariomaniglia #myfatherscadillac #happybirthday #60

Badfellas will hit 2 years on may 28th. So to honor our classic album. @frankbmusic and I will be dropping the first single “Brothers Keeper” off of my next album titled “Truth Be Told ( Face 2 ) #BADFELLAS is about to hit a million streams and we have lots of unreleased music on the way. Produced by @yungelshadi . Shoutout to my bro @layzurprinting for the dope artwork. #newmusic #boombapnation #boombaphiphop #bars

🎹🥁 @rai_shinobi 
✍🏾🎤 @thetruth_staten 
From the album TRUTH BE TOLD
Available on all digital.

Almost 2 years after the iconic release of Badfellas, Frank B and The Truth have reconnected to bring this beautiful piece of art to their audience. Brother’s Keeper serves up a dish of the realities of growing up, and away from close friends, and brothers. People who you once thought you’d die for, havent even met your kids yet. Its a sad reality, how many friends we lose as we get older. Some die. Some on permanent vacations. Some strung out on the worst life has to offer.  This El Shaddai produced record gives you everything you hope for from Frank B and The Truth. Gritty new york city boombap, with purpose and substance. Now Streaming on all digital streaming platforms. #badfellas #thetruthstaten #frankb #newmusic #newrelease #brotherskeeper #brothers #bestfriends #bestfriendsforever

2 Years ago today, me and @frankbmusic dropped the greatest thing for #Italians since #rainbowcookies 😂. This album is our greatest musical achievement ever. Over a MILLION streams worldwide, across all platforms, and climbing. 2 years later and #BADFELLAS is still bringing in over 5k plays per month. This album will forever stand the test of time. Truly a timeless body of work that we believe accurately represents our culture within hiphop. We can’t thank everyone enough for the continued love and support. I can’t describe how it feels to see how much love this album has. We’re forever grateful and we hope you guys continue to enjoy Badfellas and this new music we have on the way. 📸 by @ccmg_productions Badfellas for life. #salute #boombapnation #boombap #realrap #italianrap #mycousin

My next single is called “Poopy Heads” I love these kids. Y’all don’t even understand. My kids are my inspiration in everything I do in my life. They completely re wrote my destiny. I owe them everything. They owe me nothing #poopyheads #poop #poopy #kids #kidsbop #kidsmusic #newmusic

@zootedinc_nyc is just DIFFERENT and this is one event you’re not going to want to miss. Make sure you get in touch with my brother at Zooted to RSVP. NO, I can’t get you in for free and I can’t get you through the back door.

25 years today. I watched as a helpless child. My mother was having a medical emergency and I didn’t understand what was going on. I remember that day so vividly. What I was doing. What I was watching on tv. What I was eating. Where I was. That day is stamped in my memory and replays itself every once in a while like a reoccurring nightmare. So many things I want to say to you. So many things I want to show you. I know you would be in all your glory with these kids. I remember you being like a firecracker. Full of energy. Always on the move. Couldn’t sit down for nothing. My guardian angel. I’ll see you again one day. Until that day. Keep us all safe. Love you ❤️ Miss you ❤️. Mourn you till I join you #dearmomma #ripmom #mommy

🚨 🚨 THIS FRIDAY 🚨 🚨 Me. @nicolettecapua and @lildee_raps 2 years ago I had an idea to flip a freestyle inspired record. I hit my guy @vinnymcbeth_ and he trusted me on the idea. With his incredible production and my guidance, we were able to bring this idea to life. I sat on this for a year before playing it for @lildee_raps in one of our studio sessions and he asked to have the second verse. Although he kills it. The song was missing that special touch. We needed someone to capture that Stevie B freestyle sound. We must have went through 4/5 singers before finding @nicolettecapua. As soon as I heard her I knew this was her record. The rest is history. Growing up in New York during the 90s, this is the music we listened to at all the block parties. All the weddings and all the birthdays. Freestyle music really is a lost genre. Somewhere in between house and hiphop. I’ve never heard anyone do a freestyle record like this, and I wanted to pay homage to a genre that raised me while keeping it hiphop. I think we did something special with this. Hats off to everyone that was involved with this record and I can’t wait to deliver this smash on Friday. #freestylemusic #80sfreestyle #90sfreestyle #throwbackmusic #stevieb #betheone #covergirls

🚨 OUT NOW 🚨!!!!!!!!
#freestyleexplosion #freestylemusic #freestylemusic80s #freestylemusicforever #stevieb #covergirls #safire #tka

Huge thanks to @william_demeo_ and @gravesendseries for the placement. @frankbmusic Perfect song for a great scene where my brother @chris_mormando takes care of some business. Truly an honor to see BADFELLAS still getting so much love. #gravesend #badfellas #cosanostra #italianrap #mobmusic
Went from Truth to “Truthful”. Man I swear this the only beer at this party. I gotta put this shit down lmfao 🤣 #budlight #budweiser #imjustkidding #jokes
Don’t understand a word they sayin these days 😂 #hiphop #rap #drillmusic #newrapmusic
🚨 “I Love You” 🚨 Freestyle #statenisland #barsstillmatter #boombapnation #boombap #boombaphiphop #realrap #lyricism #painmusic

STATEN VS ANYBODY. This freestyle was supposed to be a collective freestyle from all the top artists on Staten Island. However. People started submitting verses dissing eachother and who didn’t want to be on it with someone they didn’t like. So I scrapped the whole idea. Unfortunately, Staten Island can never just get along and show love to eachother. It’s always someone beefing or someone hating. It’s sad because we have a lot of talented artists out here. If we all just got together and pushed eachother until it was our turn. We might be able to make some noise in this industry. It is what it is. I’m nice no matter who doesn’t support me. Idgaf who don’t like me. I know where my haters are. I see the people who show fake love. I see the people who don’t support but always want support. I’m good over here. I don’t do this to blow up. Which is the difference between me and other artists who love the lifestyle but not the craft. Artists who rap from a place of desperation. This been my passion since I’m a little kid. In 5 years when other artists are quitting because they didn’t make it. I’ll still be here dropping gems. Because I love the art and the culture!!! So salute to all the artists that fw me. It’s always love. 🙏🏼 #statenvseverybody #statenisland #shaolin #realrap #boombapnation #boombaphiphop #barsstillmatter #wuwednesday #wutang #wutangclan
“Fugee La” off my “Summer” album. 😏 #realrap #barsstillmatter #boombap #boombapnation #boombaphiphop

BADFELLAS hits a MILLION. Happy 50th bday hiphop. I’ll love you forever ❤️ @frankbmusic we did that brother. And no one can take it away. Big shoutout to everyone that was involved in this albums conception and creation. Badfellas is a classic album and will forever stand the test of time. #timeless #badfellas #1millionstreams #hiphop50 #hiphop50thanniversary

Dear hiphop. I could post a long story about what’s happened in my life over the past year. All I’m going to say is that god has blessed me tremendously. I accomplished what I set out to accomplish within hiphop. It’ll always be my passion. To everyone that has supported me over the years. I love each and every one of you like family. Ya boy has taken his talents down to Orlando. Over the summer I packed up and hauled a$$ down to Florida. I just couldn’t keep chasing a paycheck anymore. Me and my best friend opened up our first pizzeria, @doughboyzpizzafl and we’ve been killing it since we opened. We have been absolutely blessed. God is great. I’m good, always! 🙏🏼 #badfellas #1millionstreams #pizzaforever #doughboyzpizza
@stosbrandapparel There’s no time for tears. They’re saying I brought the cold with me to Florida. #coldwinter #doughboyz
“Just because I walk alone doesn’t mean I’m lost”
